rules.name: myRule_5
rules.label: Case Related Consignment has No Depot

Flow.description: StarTrack process that calculates case related depot based on the related consignment.

value.stringValue: AND( [Case].StarTrack_RecordType__c, [Case].Case_RecordType_Name__c <> 'Voice of Customer Incident', NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].Enquiry_Type__c, 'LDC')), [Case].ArticleTest__c <> null, [Case].ArticleTest__c.Network__c <> null, OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED([Case].ArticleTest__c), ISCHANGED([Case].Network__c)))

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression: AND( {!myVariable_current.StarTrack_RecordType__c}, {!myVariable_current.Case_RecordType_Name__c} <> 'Voice of Customer Incident', NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Enquiry_Type__c}, 'LDC')), {!myVariable_current.ArticleTest__c} <> null, {!myVariable_current.ArticleTest__c.Network__c} <> null, OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.ArticleTest__c}), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Network__c})))

value.stringValue: AND( [Case].Case_RecordType_Name__c = 'Delivery Enquiry', [Case].Network__c <> null, OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED([Case].ArticleTest__c), ISCHANGED([Case].Network__c)))
AND( [Case].StarTrack_RecordType__c, [Case].ArticleTest__c = null, [Case].Network__c = null, OR( ISCHANGED([Case].ArticleTest__c), ISCHANGED([Case].Network__c), ISNEW()) )

AND( [Case].StarTrack_RecordType__c, [Case].Case_RecordType_Name__c <> 'Voice of Customer Incident', NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].Enquiry_Type__c, 'LDC')), [Case].ArticleTest__c <> null, [Case].ArticleTest__c.Network__c = null, OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED([Case].ArticleTest__c), AND( ISCHANGED([Case].Network__c), [Case].Network__c = null)))

formulas.name: formula_myRule_5
formulas.expression: AND( {!myVariable_current.StarTrack_RecordType__c}, {!myVariable_current.Case_RecordType_Name__c} <> 'Voice of Customer Incident', NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Enquiry_Type__c}, 'LDC')), {!myVariable_current.ArticleTest__c} <> null, {!myVariable_current.ArticleTest__c.Network__c} = null, OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.ArticleTest__c}), AND( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Network__c}), {!myVariable_current.Network__c} = null)))

Flow.label: StarTrack Calculate Case Depot
